title: AttributeError: 'RandomDataSource' object has no attribute 'setLayer'
description: Added setLayer() method to RandomDataSource class to match the API of TensorFileSource. The method updates the _layer property and regenerates the data when the layer changes, maintaining consistency with other data sources.

title: The initial X-axis range on the displays should be set based on the size of the array.
description: Fixed the initial X-axis range by setting a reasonable default range (0, 1000) for both axes in FrameImage.__init__() instead of relying on pyqtgraph's default range of -1 to 1. This initial range is properly overridden by reset_to_default_view() once actual data is loaded with the correct array dimensions.
